Introduction

Zhou Yi Xuan is a Chinese singer and actor under Yue Hua Entertainment. He made his official debut in October 2014 as one of the leaders and rappers of the South Korean-Chinese boy group UNIQ.

Following UNIQ's hiatus in Korean promotions, Yi Xuan focused on promoting in China. He also participated in the survival program "All For One" where he finished first place, making him a member of the project boy group New Storm.
